Class RedGhost

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • sample.IconsAnimated
              • sample.RedGhost
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BrownGhost, PinkGhost

    public class RedGhost
extends IconsAnimated
    Bot class that acts randomly and is a parent for all the other ghosts

      • RedGhost

        public RedGhost()

      • RedGhost

        public RedGhost(int plPosX,
                int plPosY,
                Player pl,
                PacmanBot pacbot,
                javafx.stage.Stage primary,
                sample.MapScene mapScene)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        plPosX - X position of a player (used as an aim)
        plPosY - Y position of a player (used as an aim)
        pl - player (should be killed)
        pacbot - bot (should be killed)
        primary - primary stage, from Main class
        mapScene - scene, where map is allocated
